body: Wambui has just signed The Kenyans In Support of the ICC Process petition: "I believe we as Kenyans need to start somewhere to stop this insanity that is our Government dragging our name across the realm of madness in their attempt to rule this our country."
original_body: Wambui has just signed The Kenyans In Support of the ICC Process petition: "I believe we as Kenyans need to start somewhere to stop this insanity that is our Government dragging our name across the realm of madness in their attempt to rule this our country."
title: Kenya: I support the ICC process

sentence: Wambui has just signed The Kenyans In Support of the ICC Process petition: "I believe we as Kenyans need to start somewhere to stop this insanity that is our Government dragging our name across the realm of madness in their attempt to rule this our country."
